channel.title: NFT on UNCOPIED, a blog for uncopiers

item.title: ECHOES, a Virtual Exhibition from the LACMA Art + Tech Lab, EPOCH Gallery, and UNCOPIED is live !
item.description: As announced on LACMA UNFRAMED, ECHOES, a Virtual Exhibition from the LACMA Art + Tech Lab, EPOCH Gallery, and UNCOPIED was released as a NFT. ECHOES – featuring American Artist | Lukas Avendaño, EYIBRA (Abraham Brody), NNUX (Ana Lopez), and Oswaldo Erreve | Jacqueline Kiyomi Gork and Rhett LaRue | Lawrence Lek | Jen Liu | Ronald Rael and Virginia San Fratello | Sarah Rara “ECHOES,” 1/5 was already acquired by a collector, and its smart contract was triggered to pay all artists involved in the collective artwork.
